statements: SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date <= NOW();
SELECT campaign_name, email_template FROM campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%Marketing%';
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%Marketing%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Tech' OR target_audience = 'Gaming';
SELECT campaign_name, email_template FROM campaigns WHERE end_date < '2021-12-31' LIMIT 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%' AND target_audience IN ('Tech', 'Sports') ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails FROM campaign_emails GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_emails > 10;
SELECT campaign_id, email_address, sent_date FROM campaign_emails WHERE status = 'sent' ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT c.campaign_name, ce.email_address FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_emails ce ON c.campaign_id = ce.campaign_id WHERE ce.status = 'Sent';
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_emails ce ON c.campaign_id = ce.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;

SELECT c.campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_emails ce ON c.campaign_id = ce.campaign_id WHERE ce.sent_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY c.campaign_name ORDER BY total_emails DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT id, name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, id FROM email_lists WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT subject, body FROM campaign_emails WHERE sent_date IS NULL;
SELECT id, name, start_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT campaigns.id, campaigns.name, email_lists.name AS list_name FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_emails ON campaigns.id = campaign_emails.campaign_id JOIN email_lists ON email_lists.id = campaign_emails.email_list_id;
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 2000 AND (start_date < '2022-04-01' OR end_date > '2022-06-30') ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, email_address, recipient_name FROM campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_emails ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_emails.campaign_id INNER JOIN emails ON campaign_emails.email_id = emails.email_id;

SELECT emails.email_address, email_logs.log_message, email_logs.log_date FROM emails INNER JOIN email_logs ON emails.email_id = email_logs.email_id WHERE email_logs.log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY email_logs.log_date DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails FROM campaign_emails INNER JOIN campaigns ON campaign_emails.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_emails DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%'

SELECT emails.email_address, emails.recipient_name, campaigns.campaign_name FROM emails INNER JOIN campaign_emails ON emails.email_id = campaign_emails.email_id INNER JOIN campaigns ON campaign_emails.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM campaign_emails WHERE campaign_id = 3 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM emails WHERE email_id = campaign_emails.email_id)
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails FROM campaign_emails GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_emails DESC
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT segment_name FROM Segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT campaign_id, customer_id, email_subject, sent_date FROM EmailQueue WHERE sent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, segment_id FROM CampaignAudience WHERE segment_id = 3 OR segment_id = 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM EmailQueue WHERE sent_date > '2022-01-01' AND sent_date < '2022-02-01';
